tool_description: Updates customer communication preferences including channel selection, frequency settings, and content type preferences with validation and conflict resolution.

marketing_frequency.description: Marketing email frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, never

notification_types.description: Types of notifications to receive: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts

preferred_language.description: Preferred communication language code (e.g., en, es, fr)

quiet_hours_start.description: Start of quiet hours in HH:MM format

quiet_hours_end.description: End of quiet hours in HH:MM format

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist. Verify the customer ID.
Invalid frequency setting: marketing_frequency must be one of: daily, weekly, monthly, never.
Invalid notification type: notification_types must contain only: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts.
Invalid time format: quiet_hours_start and quiet_hours_end must be in HH:MM format.
Invalid language code: preferred_language must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
Conflicting settings: Cannot enable notifications without at least one communication channel enabled.
usage: Provide customer_id and the preferences to update. All preference parameters are optional and will maintain existing values if not specified.

success.description: Whether the preference update was successful

updated_preferences.description: List of preference keys that were updated

warnings.description: Any warnings about preference conflicts or issues
